resources.string: Riddle Room

C is an object oriented computer programing language.
The boiling point of the pure water is hundred degree celsius.
There are 206 bones in human body.
Venus is the closest planet to the earth.

Charles Babbage is considered to be a Father of Computer.

Newton gave us the theory of relativity.

All matter has mass and density.
Lightning rarely strikes skyscrapers.

Ocean sometime stands still.

The sound having frequency less than 20 HZ is called as Ultrasonic sound.

The Atlantic Ocean is the biggest ocean on earth.
The Atlantic Ocean is the biggest ocean on earth.
